title: Framework Decision Matrix
description: Create a function that recommends the right framework based on project requirements. This helps understand when Django is the right choice.
instructions: Implement a function that takes project requirements and returns a framework recommendation with reasoning.

hints.text: **Hint:** Create a dictionary to track scores for each framework. Loop through requirements and add points based on the scoring rules. Use max() to find the winning framework.

commonMistakes.consequence: Incomplete analysis leads to wrong recommendations
commonMistakes.correction: Systematically check each requirement and update scores accordingly
